articles.description: After an interesting on-field banter with Indian opener Mayank Agarwal, pace ace Umran Malik welcomed the Punjab Kings (PBKS) skipper with a 'rib-tickling' bouncer on matchday 70 of the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2022 at the Wankhede Stadium. Agarwal-led PBK…

articles.title: AC Milan breathe SIGH OF RELIEF winning their first Serie A title in 11 years | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: Julien Laurens joins ESPN FC to give his reaction to AC Milan defeating Sassuolo 3-0 to secure their first Serie A title since 2011. ----Subscribe to ESPN UK...

articles.author: Adrian Wojnarowski
articles.title: Sources - Michigan men's basketball coach Juwan Howard declines Los Angeles Lakers' interest - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Former NBA assistant and current Michigan coach Juwan Howard declined an overture made by the Lakers to be a candidate for the team's coaching job, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.
articles.content: University of Michigan coach Juwan Howard recently declined a Los Angeles Lakers overture for the franchise's coaching job, electing to remain at his alma mater, where Howard will coach his two sons … [+2625 chars]

articles.author: F1
articles.title: ‘This is the start of our season’ says podium finisher Russell after duelling with Verstappen in Spain - Formula 1
articles.description: George Russell said that his Spanish Grand Prix podium represented a turning point for Mercedes, given he finished third in a heavily-upgraded W13 and even went wheel-to-wheel with Max Verstappen.
articles.content: George Russell said that his Spanish Grand Prix podium represented a turning point for Mercedes in 2022, given he finished third in a heavily-upgraded W13 after going wheel-to-wheel with Max Verstapp… [+3048 chars]

articles.title: Erasmus steers Namibia to last-ball win to level series Zimbabwe 4th T20I | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Chasing 157, Namibia won on the final ball to take the series to 2-2 with one match to play
